starters.title: Start here
starters.description: Set out on your journey by building your own website, then move on to multiplayer games and collaborative web apps.

web.title: Web development
web.description: Learn how to make things happen on the web, from basic JavaScript to web APIs

python.title: Python
python.description: Learn to use one of the most powerful and beginner-friendly languages.

games.title: Games
games.description: Learn to build games, both locally and on the web!

react.title: React
react.description: Learn to use one of the most popular JavaScript frameworks out there.

chrome.title: Chrome Extensions
chrome.description: Extend the functionality of the world's most popular browser.

bots.title: Chat bots
bots.description: Make all sorts of bots for popular platforms such as Discord & Slack.

ml.title: Machine Learning
ml.description: Learn how to make machines learn with these fun projects!

node-deno.title: Node & Deno: JavaScript runtimes
node-deno.description: Running JS outside of the web can be a lot of fun.

hardware.title: Hardware
hardware.description: Bring projects from cyberspace to the real world with Arduinos and more.

c-sharp.title: C#
c-sharp.description: Learn all about C#, a language that can be used for almost anything.

hack_island.title: Adventures of Hack Island!
hack_island.description: Help Orpheus and the people of Hack Island! Learn about cybersecurity while completing an adventure in this experimental new workshop series.

functional_programming.title: Functional Programming with JavaScript
functional_programming.description: Learn the functional programming paradigm in JavaScript with this experimental new series.
